page.name: home
page.title: The Australian Cooperative Digitisation Project
page.p: The Australian Cooperative Digitisation Project at the National Library of Australia was a pilot project to develop a digital library of Australian journals, newspapers and novels published in the period 1840-1845. The University of Sydney Library hosts the four novels included within that project.

tr.td: Search keywords (full text and metadata) for 'bush'
Search keywords for the phrase 'adventures of a colonist'
Search keywords for the string 'colon' followed by 0 or more characters
